languages.text: Рассказ заканчивается хроникой бегства малой группы еретиков, сумевших уберечь трех чистокровных и угнавших торговое судно под шквальным огнем со станции. Они смогли преодолеть Зев, но повреждения были слишком сильны. "Три фаланги Перста скорби" — чистокровные Дети звезд, — затаились, погрузившись в долгий сон, а культисты смиренно наблюдали, как системы жизнеобеспечения угасают одна за другой. В последних строках автор со смирением и восторгом приветствует смерть во имя Многорукого Императора.

The story ends by chronicling the escape of a small group of heretics who managed to save three purebreds and steal a merchant ship under heavy fire from the station. They narrowly navigated the Maw, but the ship's damage was too severe. "The three phalanges of the Finger of Sorrow," the pureblood Star Children, fell into a long sleep and became dormant. Meanwhile, the cultists humbly watched the ship's life support systems fade away one after another. In the last lines, the author welcomes death in the name of the Many-Armed Emperor with solemnity and elation.

Они смогли преодолеть Зев, но повреждения были слишком сильны. "Три фаланги Перста скорби" — чистокровные Дети звезд, — затаились, погрузившись в долгий сон, а культисты смиренно наблюдали, как системы жизнеобеспечения угасают одна за другой. В последних строках автор со смирением и восторгом приветствует смерть во имя Многорукого Императора.

traits.locale_text: The story ends by chronicling the escape of a small group of heretics who managed to save three purebreds and hijacked a merchant ship under heavy fire from the station. They managed to overcome the Maw, but the damage was too severe. "The three phalanges of the Finger of Sorrow", the pureblood Children of the Stars, fell into a long sleep and became dormant, while the cultists meekly watched the ship's life support systems fade away one after another. In the last lines, the author welcomes death in the name of the Many-Armed Emperor with humility and enthusiasm.

languages.text: La historia acaba relatando la huida de un pequeño grupo de herejes que consiguieron salvar a tres purasangres y robar una nave mercantil mientras las defensas de la estación los acribillaban. Lograron atravesar las Fauces a duras penas, pero la nave había sufrido daños muy severos. «Las tres falanges del Dedo del Pesar», los Hijos de las Estrellas de sangre pura, cayeron en un profundo sopor. Mientras tanto, los cultistas observaron humildemente los fallos de cada sistema de la nave. En sus últimas frases, el autor acepta la muerte en nombre del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos con solemnidad y júbilo.
languages.original_text: The story ends by chronicling the escape of a small group of heretics who managed to save three purebreds and steal a merchant ship under heavy fire from the station. They narrowly navigated the Maw, but the ship's damage was too severe. "The three phalanges of the Finger of Sorrow," the pureblood Star Children, fell into a long sleep and became dormant. Meanwhile, the cultists humbly watched the ship's life support systems fade away one after another. traits.locale_text: La historia acaba relatando la huida de un pequeño grupo de herejes que consiguieron salvar a tres purasangres y robar una nave mercantil mientras las defensas de la estación los acribillaban. Lograron atravesar las Fauces a duras penas, pero la nave había sufrido daños muy severos. «Las tres falanges del Dedo del Pesar», los Hijos de las Estrellas de sangre pura, cayeron en un profundo sopor. Mientras tanto, los cultistas observaron humildemente los fallos de cada sistema de la nave. En sus últimas frases, el autor acepta la muerte en nombre del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos con solemnidad y júbilo.

languages.text: 物語は、局からの激しい砲火の中、3人の純血種を救い、商船を盗み出すことに成功した小さな異端者グループの逃亡記で終わっていた。彼らは辛うじて マウを航行したが、船の損傷はあまりにも深刻だった。『悲しみの指 の3本の指骨』、純血の星の御子らは長い眠りにつき、休眠状態となった。その間、教団員たちは謙虚に船の生命維持システムが次々と衰えていくのを見ていた。最後の行で、作者は多腕皇帝の名において、荘厳さと高揚感さを持ちながらも死を迎え入れていた。
languages.original_text: The story ends by chronicling the escape of a small group of heretics who managed to save three purebreds and steal a merchant ship under heavy fire from the station. They narrowly navigated the Maw, but the ship's damage was too severe. "The three phalanges of the Finger of Sorrow," the pureblood Star Children, fell into a long sleep and became dormant. Meanwhile, the cultists humbly watched the ship's life support systems fade away one after another. In the last lines, the author welcomes death in the name of the Many-Armed Emperor with solemnity and elation.

traits.locale_text: 物語は、局からの激しい砲火の中、3人の純血種を救い、商船を盗み出すことに成功した小さな異端者グループの逃亡記で終わっていた。彼らは辛うじて マウを航行したが、船の損傷はあまりにも深刻だった。『悲しみの指 の3本の指骨』、純血の星の御子らは長い眠りにつき、休眠状態となった。その間、教団員たちは謙虚に船の生命維持システムが次々と衰えていくのを見ていた。最後の行で、作者は多腕皇帝の名において、荘厳さと高揚感さを持ちながらも死を迎え入れていた。

languages.text: 在故事的结局，一群异端分子冒着星站的猛烈炮火，成功地救下了三只纯血族裔，成功盗走了一艘商船。他们驾驶着商船，勉强穿过了巨口，但商船已经残损不堪。于是“悲伤之指号的三根趾骨”，也就是虫群的三名纯血星辰之子，陷入了漫长的睡眠，进入了休眠状态。与此同时，众多邪教信徒谦卑地看着飞船的生命维持系统一个接一个地失效。在日记的最后几行文字中，作者以四臂神皇的名义，满怀庄严与狂喜，迎来了死亡。
languages.original_text: The story ends by chronicling the escape of a small group of heretics who managed to save three purebreds and steal a merchant ship under heavy fire from the station. They narrowly navigated the Maw, but the ship's damage was too severe. "The three phalanges of the Finger of Sorrow," the pureblood Star Children, fell into a long sleep and became dormant. Meanwhile, the cultists humbly watched the ship's life support systems fade away one after another. In the last lines, the author welcomes death in the name of the Many-Armed Emperor with solemnity and elation.

languages.text: Die Geschichte endet mit der Flucht einer kleinen Gruppe von Ketzern, die drei Reinblütige retten und unter schwerem Beschuss ein Handelsschiff von der Station stehlen konnten. Sie navigierten mühsam durch den Schlund, doch das Schiff war zu schwer beschädigt. "Die drei Glieder der Finger der Leids", die reinblütigen Sternenkinder, fielen in einen langen Schlaf und wurden inaktiv. Zwischenzeitlich mussten die Kultisten mit ansehen, wie die Lebenserhaltungssysteme des Schiffs der Reihe nach ausfielen. Am Ende begrüßt der Autor demütig und fast euphorisch den Tod im Namen des vielarmigen Imperators.
languages.original_text: The story ends by chronicling the escape of a small group of heretics who managed to save three purebreds and steal a merchant ship under heavy fire from the station. They narrowly navigated the Maw, but the ship's damage was too severe. "The three phalanges of the Finger of Sorrow," the pureblood Star Children, fell into a long sleep and became dormant. Meanwhile, the cultists humbly watched the ship's life support systems fade away one after another. In the last lines, the author welcomes death in the name of the Many-Armed Emperor with solemnity and elation.

traits.locale_text: Die Geschichte endet mit der Flucht einer kleinen Gruppe von Ketzern, die drei Reinblütige retten und unter schwerem Beschuss ein Handelsschiff von der Station stehlen konnten. Sie navigierten mühsam durch den Schlund, doch das Schiff war zu schwer beschädigt. "Die drei Glieder der Finger der Leids", die reinblütigen Sternenkinder, fielen in einen langen Schlaf und wurden inaktiv. Zwischenzeitlich mussten die Kultisten mit ansehen, wie die Lebenserhaltungssysteme des Schiffs der Reihe nach ausfielen. Am Ende begrüßt der Autor demütig und fast euphorisch den Tod im Namen des vielarmigen Imperators.

languages.text: L'histoire s'achève sur le récit de l'évasion d'un groupuscule d'hérétiques ayant réussi à sauver trois pur-sang et à voler un navire marchand sous les tirs nourris de la station. S'ils sont parvenus à traverser la Gueule, le vaisseau en est ressorti en piteux état. « Les trois phalanges de l'Index du Malheur », Enfants Stellaires au sang pur, ont alors sombré dans un hypersommeil prolongé, tandis que les cultistes résignés ont été témoins des pannes successives de tous les systèmes de survie embarqués. Dans les dernières lignes, l'auteur accueille la mort au nom de l'Empereur aux mille bras avec une solennité extatique.
languages.original_text: The story ends by chronicling the escape of a small group of heretics who managed to save three purebreds and steal a merchant ship under heavy fire from the station. They narrowly navigated the Maw, but the ship's damage was too severe. "The three phalanges of the Finger of Sorrow," the pureblood Star Children, fell into a long sleep and became dormant. Meanwhile, the cultists humbly watched the ship's life support systems fade away one after another. In the last lines, the author welcomes death in the name of the Many-Armed Emperor with solemnity and elation.
